overview:
Ryan Durkin is the Chief Operating Officer of CampusLIVE, Inc. Ryan is an alumni of the University of Massachusetts Amherst (â€™08), graduating with a B.B.A. in Finance and Management. He was captain of the D-1 UMass Track and Field and Cross Country teams, and was Co-Founder and President of the Isenberg Real Estate Club. Ryan was awarded some of the highest honors at UMass, including the UMass 21st Century Leadership Award, Senior Leadership Award, and Isenberg Senior Leadership Award, along with 11 other scholarships.

Ryan, along with the CampusLIVE team, was named 3rd place in the 2008 BusinessWeek “Americaâ€™s Best Young Entrepreneurs.â€ He has also been honored as an “Emerging Entrepreneur” by Deval Patrick and the Massachusetts Office of Business Development.
